Figure 1

`Threatened Status of species from the year ${selectedYear} to the year ${selectedYearEnd}`
imcraData = FileAttachment("data/SummaryData-ThreatenedSpeciesOccurrencesByMarineEcoregion-1.1.2023-06-13.csv").csv({ typed: true })
ibraData = FileAttachment("data/SummaryData-ThreatenedSpeciesOccurrencesByTerrestrialEcoregion-1.1.2023-06-13.csv").csv({ typed: true })

combinedData = Promise.all(
  [imcraData,
  ibraData]
).then(
  ([data1, data2]) => {
    return data1.concat(data2)
  }
)

Plot.plot({
  color: { legend: true, scheme: "Rainbow" },
  marks: [
    Plot.barY(
      year,
      Plot.groupX(
        { y: "count" },
        { x: "epbcStatus", fill: "epbcStatus", tip: true }
      )
    ),
    Plot.ruleY([0])
  ]
})
viewof year = Inputs.radio(d3.group(combinedData, d => d.yearStart), {label: "Year", sort: "ascending", value:'2016'})

year
selectedYear = year[0]["yearStart"]

selectedYearEnd = year[0]["yearEnd"]

Time-out error: WARNING: error writing a body to connection: An operation on a socket could not be performed because the system lacked sufficient buffer space or because a queue was full. (os error 10055): An operation on a socket could not be performed because the system lacked sufficient buffer space or because a queue was full. (os error 10055)

EcoAssets received investment (doi.org/10.47486/XN005) from the Australian Research Data Commons (ARDC). The ARDC is funded by the Australian Research Data National Collaborative Research Infrastructure Strategy (NCRIS).

Acknowledgement of Traditional Owners and Country

The project partners acknowledge Australia’s Traditional Owners and pay respect to the past and present Elders of the nation’s Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander communities. We honour and celebrate the spiritual, cultural and customary connections of Traditional Owners to the country and the biodiversity that forms part of that country.
